Package ch.sbb.maven.plugins.iib.mojos

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CleanBarBuildWorkspaceMojo
    Cleans up the ${iib.workspace} directory.
    CreateBarMojo
    Creates a .bar file from a iib-bar Project.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on iib-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn iib:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    PackageIibBarMojo
    Creates a .bar file from a iib-bar Project.
    PackageIibClassloaderMojo
    Creates a .zip file from a iib-classloader Project which contains the Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
    PackageIibParMojo
    Creates a .par file from a iib-par Project Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
    PackageIibSrcMojo
    Packages a WebSphere Message Broker Project.
    PackageUserDefinedNodeJarMojo
    Creates a .zip file from a iib-classloader Project which contains the Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
    PrepareBarBuildWorkspaceMojo
    Unpacks the dependent WebSphere Message Broker Projects.
    PrepareIibClassloaderPackagingMojo
    Copies the dependencies into a directory for packaging later Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md requiresDependencyResolution below is required for the unpack-dependencies goal to work correctly.
    PrepareIibParPackagingMojo
    Copies the dependencies into a directory for packaging later Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md requiresDependencyResolution below is required for the unpack-dependencies goal to work correctly.
    ValidateBarBuildWorkspaceMojo
    Unpacks the dependent WebSphere Message Broker Projects.
    ValidateClassloaderApproachMojo
    Goal which reads the default.properties file to figure out if the classloader approach for this bar project is consistent.
    ValidateConfigurablePropertiesMojo
    Goal which reads the a bar file, including creating a list of configurable properties
    ValidateProjectMojo
    Validates the iib project
